description: Commands to manage a Arc addon.

commands.name: az vmware addon arc create
commands.summary: Create an Arc addon for a private cloud.
commands.syntax:
az vmware addon arc create --private-cloud
                           --resource-group
                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                           [--vcenter]
examples: az vmware addon vr show --resource-group MyResourceGroup --private-cloud MyPrivateCloud

commands.name: az vmware addon arc delete
commands.summary: Delete an Arc addon for a private cloud.
commands.syntax:
az vmware addon arc delete [--ids]
                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                           [--private-cloud]
                           [--resource-group]
                           [--subscription]
                           [--yes]
examples: az vmware addon arc delete --resource-group MyResourceGroup --private-cloud MyPrivateCloud

commands.name: az vmware addon arc show
commands.summary: Show details of an Arc addon for a private cloud.
examples: az vmware addon arc show --resource-group MyResourceGroup --private-cloud MyPrivateCloud

commands.name: az vmware addon arc update
commands.summary: Update an Arc addon for a private cloud.
commands.syntax:
az vmware addon arc update [--add]
                           [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                           [--ids]
                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                           [--private-cloud]
                           [--remove]
                           [--resource-group]
                           [--set]
                           [--subscription]
                           [--vcenter]
examples: az vmware addon arc update --resource-group MyResourceGroup --private-cloud MyPrivateCloud --vcenter "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"
